item.title: Infrastructure Architect (CACHE) ~ 9638 (financial district)
item.description:
As a key contributor to the CACHE architecture integration team you will work with the external vendor, line of business, and internal hosting organizations on:
 Infrastructure architecture/design of critical integration components of the CACHE solution
 Environmental build proposals and technical reviews
 Security framework for the CACHE solution
 Design, implementation, technical/operational support of the data interfaces
 Elaboration of integration related business requirements

Position Requirements:
 Must possess US Citizenship, US National or Green Card holder with the intent to pursue citizenship.
 Excellent communication skills (oral and written) and strong analytical skills
 Expert level (5 years or more) experience in infrastructure and architecture design
 5-7 years of prior structured application integration experience
 Prior experience in designing and implementing integration architectures (preferably for government or financial institutions) for complex projects that require the participation and collaboration of cross-functional entities
 Prior experience in designing services, and building technical infrastructures for Service Oriented Architectures (SOA)
 Ability to work collaboratively, by coordinating among cross-functional internal and vendor teams for integration decisions and implementation. This will include the ability to cope with organizational differences and priorities
 Ability to apply complex heterogeneous security technologies
 Ability to implement a clear and consistent technical vision for the project. Track and resolve issues where implementation deviates from technical vision/architecture
 Ability to provide oversight to application development project teams to fit systems to architecture, as well as to identify when it is necessary to modify the technical architecture to accommodate project needs.

To apply, please visit our Careers page at: www.frbsf.org/federalreserve/careers and click on "Find A Job."
